notes:
##  ........................................ Round 1 ........................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- UPDATE: We no longer take  [Deep Pockets](item_4e5d5d1d-2c0d-4f5e-9521-9f71bdb88e9e) after its nerf. 25% ammo back is 3 ammo back which is insignificant compared to  [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e) now. We take  [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e) this first round to try and snowball some kills early on.

---

### 💣 Items:

- The best items for Round 1 are Survival items. So we'll buy  [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6)  for our 1v1 duels.

- Next its pretty obvious. We only do Weapon Power damage so more %WP and more Attack Speed are a our picks with  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf).

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Your primary objective is to earn money. You want to farm cash shooting their tank while you look for oportunities to updraft into a quick kill on their backlines. You should play like Freja in normal overwatch, its not until next round that we start becoming a real meneace.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If its a good map for  [Adrenaline Shot](item_ab8eba6a-0bda-4b12-8854-4ba4169b515f) then use that instead of  [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6).

- If you are a good player [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418) will be best for you instead of  [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) . It'll enhance your already good aim with x-ray vision from time to time.

##  ........................................ Round 2 ........................................

 ---

### 💣 Items:

- Freja is BROKEN in Stadium and its thanks to [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0). From round 2 onwards you are [TITLE CARD]. Every time you use an ability you will get 25 Overhealth! Thats INSANE on 3 abilities with 2 of them having short CD and all of them being mobility!

-  Next, we buy  [Tourniquet](item_f457a404-70c1-4f1b-b6da-8fa2e90aad54). It pairs SUPER well with  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) and with your Power   [Deep Pockets](item_4e5d5d1d-2c0d-4f5e-9521-9f71bdb88e9e) 

- The most impactful commons this early in the match are survival items that give 25 hp. So we'll spend the rest of our cash in those. 50 hp on Round 2 is the difference between winning duels or not, and between being able to flank effectively or not.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Keep farming money by dealing damage to whoever gets close first. And try to get side angles where you can annoy their backline in private.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:
 
-   [Shieldbuster](item_9ee1f150-537d-40b9-b975-7820fb1c6a66)  is a nieche option you can take instead of  [Tourniquet](item_f457a404-70c1-4f1b-b6da-8fa2e90aad54)  if you are facing a tank with armor/shields like  [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85) ,  [Reinhardt](hero_a3b6ca2c-6cbd-43dc-bb78-a728e42fba49) or [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), and a [Juno](hero_035c63b7-084c-4abd-9de5-c9a00e9b6a18).

##  ........................................ Round 3 ........................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- On 3rd we take  [Redux](item_e27dc8d9-4fa9-4e55-bf9a-7a4b3532a0d8). It'll enhance our item choices and goes insanely well with  [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e).

---

### 💣 Items:

-  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) is an insane item for Freja with how many abilities she has. It adds to our combo the same damage as 25% WP would, and it makes our pokes from far away much more lethal since that extra damage doesnt get reduced by falloff.

- Sometimes, here at Round 3, you'll wanna buy  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) instead of  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) . This could be because you dont have enough cash for Kitsune, or because you want to focus their tank this round. i've done this a lot when the enemy team has things like Moira/Kiriko/Reaper/Mei where i cant 1 or 2 shot them, so if their tank is a reinhardt/orisa/junker i'll go  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and kill the tank instead, taking advantage of their high health values.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- You should have enough damage and survivability now to justify infiltrating to their backlines and annoying the enemy team. Play with your supports until you can find that side angle to get behind enemy lines and start harassing them from behind!

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you dont have enough money for the items shown, then prioritize having  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) and  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0)  above all else. The rest can be commons, its fine.

- If you have spare money, fill your item slots with Survival commons.

##  ........................................ Round 4 ........................................

 ---

### 💣 Items:

- Just like  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb),  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) boosts our next arrows after using an ability. Mind you, both items trigger their effects on both the right-click hit and the right-click explosion. So now a single right-click will deal its own damage + 3 left-clicks + 30 from  [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) + 9% of their life total. Thats around (130+30x3+30+275x0.09) 275 damage against a 275 hp target! Perfect damage to kill in 1 right-click!

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Not much changes so i'll give a tip instead. If you briefly hold right-click and quickly release right after a dash or updraft, you will go further/higher than normal.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you dont have enough money for  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) then sell  [Tourniquet](item_f457a404-70c1-4f1b-b6da-8fa2e90aad54) for it.

##  ........................................ Round 5 ........................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- UPDATE: We take [Forager](item_154b7e20-60fd-4256-bbdd-b19df9a83c9e) now that it got buffed. It'll make us independant of our healers, goes well with our defensive items.

---

### 💣 Items:

-   [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) is, most of the time, 25% WP + 10% CR. That's really good value for our money and the few item slots we have left, so we take that.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Don't pay attention to your  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) timer. If it runs out it runs out. Its more important that you use your dashes when you NEED to and not just because you wanted to keep the %WP buff going.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you lack money, you can go for  [Portable Zipline](item_f4907cd6-08dc-4a13-b8f8-66d1949d35be) instead. If you have to sell something, don't. Instead, buy [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a).

##  ........................................ Round 6 ........................................

 ---

### 💣 Items:

- We no longer take  [Portable Zipline](item_f4907cd6-08dc-4a13-b8f8-66d1949d35be) after its nerfs. We cant spend an item slot for 5% WP. its just not feasable this late into the game.

- So instead we'll get  [Toxin Tips](item_37a11564-aef7-4e13-83de-1a4b949cd28d) to enhance our  [Redux](item_e27dc8d9-4fa9-4e55-bf9a-7a4b3532a0d8) and  [Forager](item_154b7e20-60fd-4256-bbdd-b19df9a83c9e).

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- You should be basically immortal and deadly as grim reaper. Go to the enemy backlines and kill them one by one, make them follow you and aislate them from their own team.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you have enough money to buy  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) by selling [Tourniquet](item_f457a404-70c1-4f1b-b6da-8fa2e90aad54), then do it.

- If healers are the main problem you can take  [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) instead of  [Portable Zipline](item_f4907cd6-08dc-4a13-b8f8-66d1949d35be).

##  ........................................ Round 7 ........................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- This late into the game, many people would have built some Survival items. We need some extra burst to deal with them and  [Cyclone](item_197843aa-de82-4387-b6c9-e5e1549b4832) allows us to right-click into an updraft for a double heavy crossbow hit, enough to burst a 400 hp target, which is what enemy "squishies" now have.

---

### 💣 Items:

*"Round 6 is where you plateu (your peak), i WILL suggest some items in order of best to worst, BUT! Round 7 is more of a "counter this, counter that" round than something set in stone."*

- There are 3 items you should keep no matter what:   [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448),  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb).

- The remaining 3 items can be selected from the Optionals below based on what you need.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Its the last round, try to analyze who is their most important player and focus them heavily. 

- And Communicate with your team and coordinate your pushes so that this last round you end up victorious!

- Don't be afraid to waste your  [Cyclone](item_197843aa-de82-4387-b6c9-e5e1549b4832). Prioritize your positioning more than anything. If you see the oportunity then go for the double tap, otherwise use updraft normally, its fine.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) if you are fat rich, for weapon power purposes this is the best one.

-  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce) for the same reason as  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b), its your second best option, you can take both if you want.

-  [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) is very valuable on the late-game to counter immortal builds like  [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85) or insane healers like  [Mercy](hero_0e213bfc-3ca9-49c6-9036-e7f344b752da) and [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed).

-  [Nebula Conduit](item_476b7040-54c9-4f0c-8283-b4407f6809f8) is your best defensive item, gives you enough time to live until your healers look at you, and still gives you a bit of %WP.
